com.hazelcast.internal.util

Class LocalRetryableExecution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.util.LocalRetryableExecution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OperationResponseHandler, Runnable

    public class LocalRetryableExecution
extends Object
implements Runnable, OperationResponseHandler
    Class encapsulating local execution with retry logic. The operation must not have an OperationResponseHandler set and it must return response. The retry will use the configured GroupProperty.INVOCATION_MAX_RETRY_COUNT and GroupProperty.INVOCATION_RETRY_PAUSE.
    See Also:
    Operation.returnsResponse(), Operation.getOperationResponseHandler(), GroupProperty.INVOCATION_MAX_RETRY_COUNT, GroupProperty.INVOCATION_RETRY_PAUSE, InvocationUtil.executeLocallyWithRetry(NodeEngine, Operation)

    • Method Detail

      • awaitCompletion

        public boolean awaitCompletion(long timeout,
                               TimeUnit unit)
                        throws InterruptedException
        Causes the current thread to wait until the operation has finished the thread is interrupted, or the specified waiting time elapses. The operation might have finished because it has completed (successfully or with an error) or the retry count has been exceeded.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum time to wait
        unit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        true if the operation completed or the operation retry count has been exceeded, else false
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting

      • getResponse

        public Object getResponse()
        The response of the operation execution. It may be an exception if the exception was not an instance of RetryableHazelcastException or the maximum number of retry counts was exceeded. The response may be also null if the operation has no response or the operation has not completed yet.
        Returns:
        the operation response

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • sendResponse

        public void sendResponse(Operation op,
                         Object response)
        Description copied from interface: OperationResponseHandler
        Sends a response.
        Specified by:
        sendResponse in interface OperationResponseHandler
        Parameters:
        op - the operation that got executed.
        response - the response of the operation that got executed.
